1399422350286802945.text: Also honored was Dr. Chester "Chet" Pierce, a WWII U.S. Navy veteran, who was named as a "Son of Glen Cove.” Born in Glen Cove in 1927, Dr. Pierce was a psychiatrist and the first African American full professor at Massachusetts General Hospital. He died in 2016.

1399422349032710157.text: Honored at today’s ceremony was Glen Cove’s Sgt. Ralph Young, an African American WWII soldier in the Air Corps who died in April 1945 transporting vital war supplies to China from India when his aircraft crashed into the Himalayan Mountains.

I call on Prime Minister Johnson & the British Govt to respect international law by upholding the terms of this agreement.

1303788481718738944.text: As part of the Withdrawal Agreement that saw the UK leave the EU earlier this year, the British Government agreed to the Northern Ireland Protocol, which would prevent the need for customs checks and a hard border between Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.

1303788480682655746.text: The resolution made it clear that for the US, a guarantor of the Good Friday Agreement, any bilateral trade deal w/the UK is contingent on protecting the historic peace accord and preventing the reintroduction of a hard border between Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.
